name: thirdeyesite
description: third eye ink site (Main site re jig)

scripts.minmaincss:
echo '🚧  Minifying main css 🚧
' && cleancss src/css/main.css -o src/css/main.min.css && echo '💾  SAVED 
'
scripts.minmodalcss:
echo '🚧  Minifying modal css 🚧
' && cleancss src/css/modal.css -o src/css/modal.min.css && echo '💾  SAVED 
'
scripts.mingalcss:
echo '🚧  Minifying gallery css 🚧
' && cleancss src/css/galpost.css -o src/css/galpost.min.css && echo '💾  SAVED 
'
scripts.webpack:
echo '🚧 Its webpack packing time 🚧
'&& npx webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:
echo '🚧  Running Build Process 🚧 
' && npm run minmaincss && npm run minmodalcss && npm run mingalcss && npm run webpack && echo '💾  Built 
'
scripts.look:
echo '🚧  Opening in Default Browser (Lets have a look) 🚧 
' && npm run build -s && echo '3️⃣ 
' && sleep 1 && echo '2️⃣ 
' && sleep 1 && echo '1️⃣ 
' && sleep 1 && echo '☠️  🗝 open sesame ☠️ 
' && http-server ./dist -p 1337 -o

author: nathanbuckley
